main.name: World
main.description: `Game.World` contains all the World managing functions, provided by a Worlds plugin. A `World` *is* actually a game: it keeps track of the different levels, objects, etc. in the Game. Only the `Init` function is standard, the rest of the implementation is up to the plugin.

children.name: Init
children.description: Initialize the World and the Categories. Returns the Category options. See `Game.Categories.Init()` for more info. Not required.

children.name: Update
children.description: Update the World and the Categories.
